title: How is this still a thing?
body: So I recently returned to playing League of Legends. I played a few games not doing overly well I might add, at this point I just thought I'd wing it and give ranked a crack. Big mistake. I don't think that I've ever seen more toxic people in all my gaming life as to what I witnessed today. Our lucian had some internet issues, big woop everyone gets it, to which our annie proceeded to tell the lucian to go kill himself. Like at what point does anyone think thats ok? Ive been playing this game since season 2 and have probably spent in the thousands on this game just to try help support it but if this sort of shit continues I'll regrettably have to hang the boots up on this game.
